entry.message: [info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmpo34dx1mn\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0154.10068] The filer has reported a value for foreign-derived intangible income that is not using the element defined in the US-GAAP taxonomy. The FASB has added elements for the FDII percentage amount and the FDII monetary amount in the 2022 taxonomy. These elements are:
1. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFdiiPercent 2. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFdiiAmount
The element ngvt:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationForeignIntangibleIncome with the label "Foreign derived intangible income" has been used in the filing in the disclosure section "0000114 - Disclosure - Income Taxes - Effective Income Tax Reconciliation (Details)" that should be updated to the appropriate US-GAAP element listed above.
Rule Element Id:10068 Rule version: 21.0.2CR -
